steps.title: Assessment
steps.content: We start with a deep interview to understand the challenges and specific objectives of each client. From there, we define clear goals and create a personalized plan that meets both professional and personal needs.

steps.title: Development
steps.content: Next, we work with 2 to 6 structured sessions, with practical exercises and continuous supervision. At each session, we focus on building skills and new habits that help the client manage daily pressures and improve overall well-being.

steps.title: Consolidation
steps.content: Finally, we evaluate the results and celebrate our achievements. A continuity plan is created to ensure that the progress made is maintained, strengthening the balance between professional and personal life.

questions.title: Is it relevant to work on issues of work and family with the same professional?
questions.description: Not only relevant, but also recommended. The principles that maintain healthy relationships are the same within all systems that the individual occupies. Laws like order, hierarchy, balance between giving and receiving, and belonging, are present in all our relationships with small specificities in relation to the posture that the client must present. Generally, changing the posture and intervening in any of the 3 pillars mentioned above, influence the other systems, being thus, a source of multiple balance in all areas of your vision.

questions.title: Can psychologists (psychologists) use coaching in their professional practice?
questions.description: According to the CRP/PR- Regional Council of Psychology, it is possible that the psychologist (psychologist) utilizes coaching in their professional practice. However, this technique can be used by the psychologist (psychologist) in a complementary way to the practice. Being thus, the professional should act in a way that is consistent with the Fundamental Principles and Articles of the Code of Ethics of the Psychologist.

questions.title: How can we define coaching and what is the line between psychotherapy and coaching?
questions.description:
According to the CFP- Federal Council of Psychology, while a process that proposes to assist the individual in achieving previously defined objectives, coaching is a technique that transits between fields of action that address autoconsciousness and human development, which are also contents of Psychology.
It is emphasized that the psychologist (psychologist) who utilizes this technique in their practice should do so in a complementary way to Psychology, once their professional practice is as Psychologist (psychologist).

about.title: Conheça Douglas Borges
about.entry: Douglas Borges é um psicólogo e psicanalista com quase 10 anos de experiência, especializado em consultoria psicológica e inteligência emocional. Ele se dedica a ajudar profissionais de alto nível, como CEOs e executivos, a equilibrar suas vidas pessoais e profissionais. Sua abordagem visa alinhar os desafios da gestão corporativa com a qualidade de vida, promovendo um equilíbrio saudável entre as exigências do trabalho e os compromissos pessoais.

items.title: Psicólogo
items.description: Douglas possui registro profissional (CRP/PR 08-21013 e CRP/SC 12-13884) e tem experiência em diversas áreas da psicologia, incluindo a terapia cognitiva comportamental, analítica e psicanalítica.

items.title: Consultoria Organizacional
items.description: Ele atua como psicólogo organizacional, oferecendo treinamento e desenvolvimento para líderes e equipes nas empresas.

items.title: Experiência Diversificada
items.description: Antes de sua carreira na psicologia, Douglas trabalhou como engenheiro químico por sete anos e foi empreendedor em diferentes setores, incluindo indústria e varejo.

approaches.title: Abordagens de Trabalho
approaches.entry: Douglas utiliza uma variedade de métodos terapêuticos para atender às necessidades de seus clientes:

items.title: Psicoterapia
items.description: Oferece sessões terapêuticas focadas na análise de questões emocionais e comportamentais, com o objetivo de promover autoconhecimento e mudanças positivas.

items.title: Orientação Psicológica
items.description: Ajuda indivíduos a resolver conflitos pessoais ou profissionais, desenvolver autoconfiança e equilibrar a ansiedade.

items.title: Análise de Perfil Comportamental
items.description: Realiza análises para compatibilizar perfis emocionais de colaboradores com as expectativas organizacionais.

mission.title: Missão
mission.entry: A missão de Douglas é proporcionar um espaço seguro onde seus clientes possam explorar seus desafios emocionais e encontrar soluções práticas para melhorar sua qualidade de vida. Ele enfatiza a importância do equilíbrio entre as demandas profissionais e pessoais, buscando sempre o bem-estar mental dos indivíduos que atende.
